reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Prof. Chen's practical approach to coding is incredibly helpful.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures can be dry. More interactive sessions would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Lee is always available for extra help. Great problem-solving techniques.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's real-world examples make the material relatable and easy to understand.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are monotonous. Prof. Brown needs to engage students more effectively.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Tough grader, but Dr. White's lab sessions are incredibly informative and well-organized.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Smith has extensive knowledge, but sometimes goes off-topic during discussions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's passion for the subject is inspiring. Her classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex economic theories. Prof. Wilson's real-world applications are helpful.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's field trips and hands-on approach make learning both fun and effective.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but Prof. Taylor's lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's research-oriented teaching style is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chang seems disorganized and often unprepared for class discussions.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis's passion for art is infectious. Her visual presentations are stunning and informative.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's practical approach and industry experience add great value to the course.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows her stuff, but the pace of the course can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's case study approach provides excellent real-world insights. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Parker's interactive teaching style makes learning languages enjoyable and effective.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but Prof. Wright could improve on making lectures more engaging.
